billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Authorizes administrative enforcement of state and local housing maintenance laws
summary: Authorizes localities to establish administrative proceedings for the enforcement of state and local housing maintenance codes; permits administratively imposed penalties to be dockets and enforced in the same manner as a judgement in a civil action without further judicial proceedings.
